articles.description: Chattahoochee Police say the vials, valued at $5,000 each, were apparently stolen from the hospital’s medical storage unit.
articles.content:
CHATTAHOOCHEE, Fla. (WCTV) - Police are investigating after two vials of COVID-19 vaccine went missing from Florida State Hospital.
